entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 40 percent chance of ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
